Plot: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.
Title: My Life as a Dog
Writer: Reidar Jönsson (novel), Lasse Hallström, Reidar Jönsson, Brasse Brännström, Per Berglund
Actors: Anton Glanzelius, Tomas von Brömssen, Anki Lidén, Melinda Kinnaman
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 3 nominations.
